edu.biu.scapi.primitives.kdf.bc
Class BcKdfISO18033

java.lang.Object
  edu.biu.scapi.primitives.kdf.bc.BcKdfISO18033
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyDerivationFunction
public class BcKdfISO18033
extends java.lang.Object
implements KeyDerivationFunction

This is a concrete class of KDF for ISO18033. This class wraps the implementation of bouncy castle.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Meital Levy)

deriveKey in interface KeyDerivationFunction
